content.title: Automated Discord Server Setup and Interaction Bot
content.description: This Discord bot streamlines server setup and management processes. With a single command, it can populate a server with predefined roles, categories, and channels, saving administrators significant time and effort. The bot's capabilities extend beyond initial setup, offering interactive content deployment such as buttons and modals within channels. A key feature is its seamless integration with Firebase, enabling real-time data collection of user interactions from the moment the server is populated. This combination of automation, interactivity, and data management makes it an invaluable tool for Discord community managers and researchers alike.

infoBoxes.title: Technologies
infoBoxes.content: Firebase Realtime Database, Git Bash, Oracle VM, Git, Discord.py, Asyncio, OS, JSON

infoBoxes.title: Key Features
infoBoxes.content: Server Automation, Interactive Content, Real-time Data Collection
